item.title: Blackstone 出售拉斯维加斯大道度假村 8 亿美元股份
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 将向 Realty Income Corp. 出售 CityCenter Las Vegas 综合体的优先股权，在这笔交易中，这家另类资产管理公司可兑现其投资，同时保留对该物业的控制权。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is selling a preferred equity stake in the CityCenter Las Vegas complex to Realty Income Corp. in a deal that lets the alternative asset manager cash in on its investment while retaining control of the property.】

item.title: 被誉为 "年轻的特斯拉 "的电动飞机制造商赢得分析师青睐
item.description: 华尔街看好贝塔科技公司（Beta Technologies Inc.【原文：Wall Street is bullish on Beta Technologies Inc., calling the electric-powered plane maker an early leader in the regional aircraft industry.】

item.title: 关税冲击销售额，阿尔戈马钢铁公司将裁员 40
item.description: 加拿大钢铁制造商阿尔戈马钢铁集团（Algoma Steel Group Inc.【原文：Canadian steelmaker Algoma Steel Group Inc. will let go of 1,000 employees and close its blast furnace in northern Ontario within months as it seeks to stem losses resulting from US tariffs.】

item.title: 佛蒙特州小型工作学院因招生人数减少将停止教学
item.description: 斯特林学院（Sterling College）是佛蒙特州北部的一所小学院，只有不到 40 名学生，它计划在小规模学校难以为继的时候，结束其学位课程，变现少量资产以偿还债务，并看看能否重新规划自己的使命。【原文：Sterling College, a tiny college in northern Vermont with less than 40 students, plans to wind down its degree programs, liquidate a handful of assets to pay off debt and see if it can re-imagine its mission at a time when small schools are struggling to stay afloat.】

item.title: 巴里克分拆提案使内华达州黄金资产成为并购焦点
item.description: 据分析师称，巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）提出的将其在美国的资产从其在风险较高国家的庞大投资组合中剥离出来的建议，将激起竞争对手矿商的兴趣。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp.’s proposal to hive off its US assets from its sprawling portfolio in riskier countries will pique the interest of rival miners, according to analysts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国内生产总值将创三年新高，加息问题备受争议
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的经济增长速度可能是三年来最快的，同时通胀率也有所上升，这促使交易商和一些经济学家打赌储备银行的下一步行动将是加息。【原文：Australia’s economic growth probably accelerated at the fastest pace in three years last quarter, coinciding with hotter inflation that’s prompted traders and some economists to wager the Reserve Bank’s next move will be an interest-rate increase.】

item.title: 乌克兰提出以债券取代与增长挂钩的认股权证
item.description: 乌克兰开始将与经济增长相关的证券兑换成债券，因为在与一批私人债权人进行新一轮谈判后，乌克兰正寻求重组 32 亿美元债务的条款。【原文：Ukraine started a process to exchange securities linked to economic growth into bonds as it seeks to restructure the terms of $3.2 billion debt after another round of talks with a group of private creditors.】

item.title: 汽油价格跌至四年低点，原因是油价低廉、需求平淡
item.description: 美国每加仑汽油的油价是四年多来最便宜的，但仍远高于唐纳德-特朗普总统将油价降至 2 美元以下的承诺。【原文：The cost to pump a gallon of gas in the US is the cheapest in more than four years but remains well above President Donald Trump’s pledge to bring the price below $2.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮进入下一阶段
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 埃尔-查波之子将在贩毒起诉中改判
item.description: 据法庭文件显示，被监禁的大毒枭华金-"埃尔-查波"-古兹曼（Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman）的四个儿子之一，将在指控他参与贩毒阴谋的案件中改变无罪答辩。【原文：One of the four sons of imprisoned drug kingpin Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman, is set to change his not guilty plea in a case charging him in a drug trafficking conspiracy, according to court documents.】

item.title: 场外交易法庭：欧洲交易所渴望击退美国上市对手
item.description: 在欧洲证券交易所努力挽留受美国交易所吸引的上市企业之际，一家总部位于纽约的交易平台主动表示愿意成为盟友。【原文：As European bourses fight to retain listings lured by US exchanges, one New-York based trading platform is offering itself as an ally.】

item.title: 最高法院质疑针对考克斯的 10 亿美元音乐盗版诉讼案
item.description: 美国最高法院就音乐产业对考克斯通信公司（Cox Communications Inc.【原文：The US Supreme Court weighed giving internet providers a stronger shield from legal liability when customers pirate copyrighted works, questioning a $1 billion music industry copyright lawsuit against Cox Communications Inc.】

item.title: 冬季风暴将给纽约带来降雨，中西部地区将出现混雪天气
item.description: 一场快速移动的暴风雪将在美国中西部和南部地区带来混合寒冷天气，然后在新英格兰地区降下大雪，纽约和华盛顿地区降雨。【原文：A fast-moving storm will drag a mix of wintry weather across the US Midwest and South before dropping heavy snow across New England and rain in New York and Washington.】

item.title: 欧洲杠杆贷款银行家迎来 6 月以来最繁忙的周一
item.description: 欧洲的杠杆贷款市场迎来了自 6 月份以来最繁忙的一个星期一，因为借款人在这个可能是 2025 年最后一个机会窗口之一的日子里挤满了交易。【原文：Europe’s leveraged loan market had its busiest Monday since June as borrowers crammed deals through what may be one of the last windows of opportunity in 2025.】

item.title: AI 债券大潮迫使部分投资者寻求 MBS 的庇护
item.description: 包括哥伦比亚Threadneedle公司在内的基金经理们正在密切关注美国抵押贷款支持证券，将其视为躲避美国企业债券高估值和科技债券抛售潮的避风港，这可能会影响回报率。【原文：Money managers including Columbia Threadneedle are looking closely at US mortgage backed securities as a place to hide from high valuations in US corporate bonds and a wave of tech bond sales that could weigh on returns.】

item.title: 美联储警示与办公空间和资本规划相关的潜在风险
item.description: 美联储银行监管人员正在对社区银行和地区银行的商业房地产投资组合进行监控，因为他们担心 "利率上升、承保标准收紧以及商业房地产价值下降"。【原文：Federal Reserve bank supervisors are monitoring community and regional banks’ commercial real estate portfolios amid concerns over “elevated interest rates, tighter underwriting standards, and lower commercial property values,” the agency said.】

item.title: 英国央行行长格林称需要更多就业疲软支持降息
item.description: 英格兰银行决策者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，劳动力市场需要进一步疲软，她才能支持再次降息。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene said the labor market needs to weaken further before she can back another interest-rate reduction.】

item.title: 秘鲁通胀升幅低于预期助推降息前景
item.description: 秘鲁首都利马 11 月份的通胀率增幅低于预期，这增加了秘鲁央行在连续两个月维持利率不变后下调利率的可能性。【原文：Inflation in Peruvian capital Lima rose less than expected in November, boosting chances that the central bank could cut interest rates after holding them unchanged for two straight months.】

item.title: 美国称预言欺诈案可能涉及机密信息
item.description: 美国检察官表示，针对预言资产管理公司（Prophecy Asset Management）共同所有人杰弗里-斯帕茨（Jeffrey Spotts）投资者损失 3 亿美元的欺诈案可能涉及机密信息，同时要求将定于 1 月份进行的审判推迟至少两个月。【原文：The fraud case against Prophecy Asset Management co-owner Jeffrey Spotts over $300 million in investor losses may involve classified information, US prosecutors said while seeking a delay of at least two months in a trial set for January.】

item.title: 迪斯尼寻求能源交易商，大公司努力降低电力成本
item.description: 随着大公司在控制能源成本方面越来越精明，华特迪士尼公司正在寻找一名能源交易员。【原文：Walt Disney Co. is looking for an energy trader as major corporations grow more shrewd about controlling their energy costs.】

item.title: 海湾能源公司获得肯尼亚对图洛公司前油田的减税优惠
item.description: 一家能源贸易公司收购了图洛石油公司（Tullow Oil Plc）在东非国家的区块，肯尼亚同意给予该公司税收减免，并允许提高回收成本，以加快该项目开发进度，该项目计划于明年投产。【原文：Kenya agreed to grant tax breaks and allow higher recovery costs to an energy trading firm that acquired Tullow Oil Plc’s blocks in the East African country to accelerate development of the project whose output is planned for next year.】

item.title: 西班牙要求电信公司建立备份以避免停机
item.description: 西班牙政府将强制要求西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）和 Cellnex Telecom SA 等当地电信公司安装备用电源系统，以确保在发生重大灾难时提供电话和互联网服务。【原文：Spain’s government is set to mandate that local telecommunications firms such as Telefónica SA and Cellnex Telecom SA install power backup systems to ensure phone and internet services during major disasters.】

item.title: 牙买加获得 67 亿美元资金用于飓风后重建
item.description: 牙买加从多边贷款机构获得了为期三年、总额达 67 亿美元的一揽子融资计划，以帮助在一场破坏性飓风之后的重建工作，这场飓风摧毁了关键的基础设施、工业和住宅。【原文：Jamaica secured a three-year financing package from multilateral lenders totaling $6.7 billion to help rebuild following a devastating hurricane that damaged key infrastructure, industry and homes.】

item.title: 尼日利亚第三季度经济增长快于预期
item.description: 尼日利亚第三季度的经济增长速度略高于预期。【原文：Nigeria’s economy grew at a slightly faster pace than expected in the third quarter.】

item.title: DeepSeek 推出新的人工智能模型，与谷歌和 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: 中国的 DeepSeek 公司推出了其几周前发布的人工智能实验模型的两个新版本，增加了新的功能。【原文：China’s DeepSeek unveiled two new versions of an experimental artificial-intelligence model it released weeks ago, adding fresh capabilities the startup said would help with combining reasoning and executing certain actions autonomously.】

item.title: 加纳正在培训其贷款人以拓展伊斯兰银行服务
item.description: 加纳中央银行正在采取措施，鼓励提供符合伊斯兰法的金融服务，并为其贷款人提供无息银行原则方面的培训。【原文：Ghana’s central bank is taking steps to encourage the provision of financial services that are compliant with Islamic law and is offering its lenders training in non-interest banking principles.】

item.title: OpenAI 参股 Thrive Holdings，为循环交易添砖加瓦
item.description: OpenAI 正在参股 Thrive 控股公司（Thrive Holdings），后者是 Thrive Capital 今年早些时候成立的一家投资机构。【原文：OpenAI is taking an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, an investment vehicle set up earlier this year by Thrive Capital, adding to a growing list of circular deals involving the ChatGPT maker and its backers.】

item.title: 红杉押注人工智能初创公司，以减轻财富顾问的繁重工作
item.description: 许多公司都在试图用人工智能取代财富顾问，但马克-斯旺（Mark Swan）打赌，人类将继续存在。【原文：Many companies are trying to replace wealth advisers with artificial intelligence, but Mark Swan’s bet is that humans are here to stay.】

item.title: 美国工厂活动创四个月来最大降幅
item.description: 由于订单减少，11 月份美国工厂活动出现了四个月来最大程度的萎缩，这表明制造商正努力摆脱长期以来的萎靡不振。【原文：US factory activity shrank in November by the most in four months as orders weakened, indicating manufacturers are struggling to break free from an extended period of malaise.】

item.title: 加密货币跌势加深，美股下滑，日本央行暗示政策转向
item.description: 进入 12 月份后，美国股市情绪谨慎，受到加密货币再次下滑以及日本央行发出可能很快收紧政策的信号后债券收益率上升的压力。【原文：US stocks entered December in a cautious mood, pressured by a renewed slide in cryptocurrencies and rising bond yields after the Bank of Japan signaled it may soon tighten its policy.】
